endsWithDateTime.message: It is recommended to use %s for date and time values

endsWithUriUrlLink.message: It is recommended to use %s for urls

hasBooleanPrefix.message: Based on its name, the parameter looks like a boolean

array.message: It is recommended to use data structures or scalar types in combination with "[]" instead of generic "%2$s"

bool.message: It is recommended to use %1$s instead of %2$s

int.message: It is recommended to use %1$s instead of %2$s

object.message: It is recommended to use specific data structures instead of generic "%2$s"

f:base.message: The base tag must not be used within components

f:be.*.message: The backend ViewHelpers should not be used within components

f:cache.*.message: The caching ViewHelpers should not be used within components

f:cObject.message: TypoScript content must be passed as a component parameter

f:debug.message: f:debug may be used in components, but should not be used in production

f:flashMessages.message: Flash messages must be passed as a component parameter

f:form.message: Form ViewHelpers may be used deliberately within components

f:form.*.message: Form ViewHelpers may be used deliberately within components

f:format.html.message: f:format.html must be used outside of the component, f:format.raw may be used within component to render HTML previously passed through f:format.html

f:image.message: f:image should be used deliberately within components (e. g. only in Atom.Image)

f:inline.message: Inline fluid code may be used deliberately within components

f:layout.message: Layouts are currently not supported within components and thus must not be used

f:link.*.message: URIs must be generated outside of components and then passed as TypoLink parameter

f:media.message: f:media should be used deliberately within components (e. g. only in Atom.Media)

f:render.message: Rendering sections or partials is currently not supported within components and thus must not be used

f:renderChildren.message: Widgets should be part of integration

f:section.message: Sections are currently not supported within components and thus must not be used

f:security.*.message: Frontend user logic must happen outside of components and then passed as a parameter

f:translate.message: Translate may be used within components, try to pass translations via component parameters instead

f:uri.*.message: URIs must be generated outside of components and then passed as TypoLink parameter

f:widget.*.message: Widgets should be part of integration
